Pour Over Coffee Maker

hourglass carafe, Borosilicate glass

(4664) Ratings

For perfect coffe - any time.

No matter how your day looks like - a stressful workday, casual dinner, or just running errands - the pour over brewing process will deliver the perfect cup of coffee, without any sediments or bitter elements.

Dispatched in 4 working days
